resources.string: The name is <myName>.
<shy>I'm something of a trader myself.
<no><NPCName>? Never heard of him.
But you know what I have heard of?
<pumped>Great deals.
So if you're in the mood for some of those, I'm your guy.
What was your name again?
<PlayerName>, I like you. I like you a lot.
<yes>Let's do some deals. Lets trade some wheels.
Happy <IslandDay>!
Happy <IslandDay>!
Happy <IslandDay>!
Happy <IslandDay>!
Welcome back, <PlayerName>.
Are you here to talk business?
Want to buy anything?
Got any deals?
Nevermind.
<yes>Alright then. Just remember I only buy in bulk.
I won't take anything less than 50 of an item.
But I will pay double, just for you, <PlayerName>.
I've always got great deals.
Take a look around.
Righto.
<sigh>Hmmm, you know what they say, <PlayerName>. Time is <Dinks>
<angry>And you just wasted my time.
<no>Don't come back unless you really want to do business.
<thinking>Oh, yes... all these bulk items...
Plus my very, very fair bonus...
I can give you <$>. Take it or leave it.
Take it.
Leave it.
Very good. Yes. Very good.
Thank you for your goods here, suck- I mean <PlayerName>.
<yes>Here is your <$>.
<proud>Pleasure as always.
Hmmm...
<no>It seems these items aren't worth anything at all...
<shy>Well, if you didn't want them I could probably take them off your hands?
Yes, I dont want them.
I'll have them back thanks.
<glee>Excellent.
<size=11>I can definetly sell these for something...<size>
Great to see you as always, <PlayerName>.
<thinking>Hmmmm. Very well.
<no>Like I said, they aren't worth anything.
<yes>But you can have them back, I guess.
Happy <SkyFest>!
Happy<SkyFest>!
You know what?
<yes>I’ve had a wonderful day today, <petName>.
<thinking>And this <Aurora> is a great way to end a great day.
<yes>Every day here on <IslandName> gets better and better.
Happy <SkyFest>!
<no>It's a shame really, missing out on a great deal you are.
Have you ever tried to make a new plant?
How would I do that?
Perhaps you could splice the seeds?
I could never do that!
I do not understand…
It would hurt the seeds!
I require your assistance.
Sure!
Please stop bothering me when I am trying to work.
I thought I was helping…
You were not.
What is your favourite plant?
Like, it’s hard to pick one type…
Type? I want to see the specific plant.
I, like, love them all equally.
Impossible.
Your tools are inferior to anything I can craft.
My tools are much cheaper though.
Yes they are.
But, they get the job done!
Yes they do. Slowly.
Why do I talk to you…
Are you interested in stocking some of my inventions?
That sounds great!
But I need to run my shop!
Then this business proposal is now moot.
Well, I have to send a lot back home…
I suppose someone back in South City is doing research for you?
You could say that…
Then I hope you share what you have learnt soon.
So this power can allow you to see the future?
Sometimes.
And how can I access this power?
You need to feel it, y’know?
Hmmm. Kinetic energy of some sort..
No. Not at all!
What do you mean my coat is drab?
You should come and see me.
I am seeing you now and my coat is just as functional as ever.
I could make you a nicer coat!
No thank you. This one is adequate.
I have an idea for a motorised machine for sewing.
Oh wow!
It will pull in a lot of power though.
Oh, but I don’t want it to mess with my chakras.
I see.
No such license exists.
Well it flamin’ should!
That is not for me to decide.
Just… be careful, will you?
Fine. I will sell only four at a time.
Do you remember much about the Shiny Discs?
How old do you think I am?!
Honestly, I could not begin to estimate.
Well it was before my time, I’ll tell you what!
Did your father ever venture into the deep mines?
Oh, my father went everywhere, I’ll tell you what!
Then perhaps you would answer a few questions?
Sure, how long you got?
Have you performed any experiments on your creatures?
Um… no? What?
You could make them stronger, faster, better!
I think they’re fine just the way they are, thanks.
But with the right upgrades...
I heard you, I’m just not interested, mate.
Think of the possibilities!
Just leave nature alone, yeah?
Does the smell not bother you?
A little, but you’re not that bad, mate!
I am speaking of your creatures.
Oh, maybe. Some of them have really sensitive noses!
Have you ever considered a different field?
Further north, you mean?
I mean some other occupation.
Oh. All the time! But what about my customers?
I believe they would survive.
I spent yesterday arranging my instruments.
Is that why you cancelled your appointment?
I did not make an appointment.
I’m free tomorrow, my client list is pretty short.
Of that, I am certain.
Have you considered adding restraints to your chair?
I don’t think it’s going to go anywhere.
I was thinking of your customers.
Oh, might be an idea, then. Safety first!
What will you do when your collection is complete?
Categorization and filing!
Of course, but what then?
Re-categorization and re-filing!
Do you dissect your specimens?
Oh, no! I could never do that!
Then you are missing out on so much knowledge!
I think um, maybe that’s okay?
How did you collect all of your specimens?
Oh! <PlayerName> has been helping.
What a remarkable coincidence.
Yeah, they’ve been really helpful!
If all your Dinks could buy infinite knowledge, would you part with them?
Hmph. Certainly not.
But you would know everything.
If I need something done, I would simply pay someone.
<IslandName> is amazing for research.
I wouldn’t call a place crawling with critters amazing.
But you can play with the very laws of nature here!
If there were any laws I would have started suing long ago.
I am developing a machine that can turn tin into gold
If you need someone to fund your research, talk to me.
Now that you mention it, I do require a large sum of <Dinks>.
Large sum? Count me out.
How do you sterilise your equipment?
Sterra what?
I mean, how do you clean everything?
Just good old fashioned elbow grease, darl
…I feel ill.
They are necessary for my work.
I just never see you wear them.
You never see me at work.
You sure they’re just not for show?
Do you know why the food has these effects?
What difference does that make?
To achieve a deeper understanding!
Would that make it taste better?
